Japanese Lesson 1

Introduce Yourself

A: Hajimemashite. Watashi wa Esra desu. B: Hajimemashite. Watashi wa … desu. A: Douzo, Yoroshiku onegai shimasu.

You see a simple introduction dialogue above. The word “Douzo” makes the sentence even more gentle. We entered the environment and saw our friend. If we want to introduce him/her to the person we just introduced. The template we use: Kochira wa …san desu.

Salute Shapes:

  • For Morning: Ohayo Gozaimasu
  • For Afternoon: Konnichiwa
  • For Evening: Konbanwa

Goodbye Shapes:

  • Sayonara
  • Dewa Mata
